summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. Lesley Groff informs Amanda Kirby that Epstein will not be available on the originally proposed date of October 8, 2013, and suggests rescheduling for October 10, 2013.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and communicates the change in schedule.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and is in communication with Lesley Groff.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual with whom the meeting is being scheduled.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are coordinating a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein.
Lesley Groff is associated with Jeffrey Epstein as she is involved in scheduling meetings with him.
Amanda Kirby is involved in meetings with Jeffrey Epstein, as indicated by her communication regarding scheduling.

events.title: Proposed Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting was proposed for October 8, 2013, but was later rescheduled.

events.title: Rescheduled Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The meeting with Jeffrey Epstein was rescheduled to October 10, 2013.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff communicated a change in schedule for a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
The original meeting date was October 8, 2013, which was not feasible.
The meeting was proposed to be rescheduled for October 10, 2013.
